name: Ninja rescue
description:
First of all this is a prototype of a prototype so please be gentle on the commentary

this... game was originally made for jamdna-13

controls:

use the arrows to move jump and duck and the space to make a temporary air block be careful though you can only walk on it you can't jump

your goal is to evade the black things(supposed to be guards) and free all the tied up stick men 

the guards won't see you if they're not moving your way (looking at you)

you have a radius of 3 times the width of them if you're within that range you will be caught (if they're looking at you)

Criteria#1:stealth as I mentioned you have to sneak past the guards

Criteria#2:Jump kind of obvious you can jump

Criteria#3:Purple the main character and the basic ground are purple really doesn't get more obvious

Criteria#4:Wham! Sounds I made it the sound of you getting caught by a guard as well as the sound of you falling out of the room(can't be done in this prototype

P.s: I should mention that the current file isn't just an alpha with just one level but is a bit buggy as well

Credits the background of the main menu and the level are both from the assets game maker pro 8 comes with
